# NSTextSelectionNavigation.LayoutOrientation.horizontal

**Case**

The value that defines horizontal layout orientation.

## Declaration

```swift
case horizontal
```

## Layout orientations

- **NSTextSelectionNavigation.LayoutOrientation.vertical**: The value that defines vertical layout orientation.

items.description: The value that defines vertical layout orientation.
